text: Populaire is a 2012 French-Belgian romantic comedy movie. It is set in France and New York City in the late 1950s. It was directed by RÃ©gis Roinsard. It was released in the United Kingdom on 31 May 2013. ==Other websites== * Category:2012 romantic comedy movies Category:Belgian romance movies Category:Belgian comedy movies Category:French-language movies Category:French romance movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Movies set in New York City Category:Movies set in the 1950s
